program.name: DepthOfCoverage00
program.description: Assess sequence coverage by a wide array of metrics, partitioned by sample, read group, or library

option.label: Gene List
option.description: Calculate coverage statistics over this list of genes

option.label: omit DepthOutput At Each Base
option.description: Disabling the tabulation of total coverage at every base should speed up processing.

option.label: BAM list
option.description: Input Bam(s)

option.label: Output
option.description: Base output

option.label: Count Type
option.description: How should overlapping reads from the same fragment be handled?

option.label: Max base Quality
option.description: Bases with quality scores higher than this threshold will be skipped.

program.name: SelectVariants
program.description: Select a subset of variants from a larger callset

option.label: Variants
option.description: Input VCF file

option.label: Select Expression
option.description: One or more criteria to use when selecting the data. See GATK doc

option.label: Exclude Non Variants
option.description: Don't include non-variant sites

option.label: invert Mendelian Violation
option.description: Output non-mendelian violation sites only

option.label: invert selection
option.description: Invert the selection criteria for select

option.label: Max Indel Size
option.description: Maximum size of indels to include

option.label: Output
option.description: File to which variants should be written

program.name: PhaseByTransmission
program.description: Compute the most likely genotype combination and phasing for trios and parent/child pairs

option.label: Variants
option.description: Input VCF file

option.label: Father Allele First
option.description: Ouputs the father allele as the first allele in phased child genotype. i.e. father|mother rather than mother|father.

option.label: Mendelian Violations File
option.description: File to output the mendelian violation details

option.label: Output
option.description: File to which variants should be written

program.name: FindCoveredIntervals
program.description: Outputs a list of intervals that are covered above a given threshold

option.label: BAM list
option.description: Input Bam(s)

option.label: Coverage Threshold
option.description: The minimum allowable coverage to be considered covered

option.label: Active Region Extension
option.description: The active region extension; if not provided defaults to Walker annotated default

option.label: Force Active
option.description: If provided, all bases will be tagged as active

option.label: Active region max size
option.description: The active region maximum size; if not provided defaults to Walker annotated default

option.label: Min Base Quality
option.description: The minimum allowable base quality score to be counted for coverage

option.label: Min Mapping Quality
option.description: The minimum allowable mapping quality score to be counted for coverage

option.label: Band pass sigma
option.description: The sigma of the band pass filter Gaussian kernel

option.label: Active Probability Threshold
option.description: Threshold for the probability of a profile state being active.

option.label: Uncovered
option.description: Output intervals that fail the coverage threshold instead

option.label: Activity Profile
option.description: Output the raw activity profile results in IGV format

option.label: Activity Region Out
option.description: Output the active region to this IGV formatted file

option.label: Ouput
option.description: An output file created by the walker. Will overwrite contents if file exists

option.label: reassign mapping quality from
option.description: Original mapping quality

option.label: reassign mapping quality to
option.description: Desired mapping quality
